com.epic.autoplayer
Class PlayerRequestListener

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.epic.autoplayer.PlayerRequestListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class PlayerRequestListener
extends java.lang.Thread

Class responsible to listen for requests sent via socket on port 8080. An single socket connection may send several movie URLs. Each line of the request must contain one single URL including its file name. Each video URL is enqueued and the entire queue available via getPlaylist() method.

Author:
Rodrigo Vargas
